title: haddock chowder
description: Enjoy a little luxury with ingredients straight from your freezer and store cupboard - it's ready in under 30 minutes, too!Each serving provides 424kcal, 34g protein, 32g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 17g fat (of which 7g saturates), 4g fibre and 1.7g salt.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz frozen chopped onion (or 1 medium onion, chopped)
2 medium potatoes (approximately 200g/7oz each), peeled, cut into roughly 2cm/¾in cubes
125g/4½oz frozen sliced leeks (or 1 medium leek, trimmed and finely sliced)
handful roughly chopped fresh flatleaf parsley leaves, to garnish (optional)
